cStoreBtnActionPerformed

private void cStoreBtnActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
Code to when pressing the cSTORE button.

This test expects a server running on "localhost", listening at port 104, AET = "ARCHIVE".

cEchoBtnActionPerformed

private void cEchoBtnActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
Code to when pressing the cECHO button.

This test expects a server running on "localhost", listening at port 104, AET = "ARCHIVE".

cFindMoveBtnActionPerformed

private void cFindMoveBtnActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
Code to when pressing the cFIND/cMOVE button.

This test expects a archive running on "localhost", listening at port 104, AET = "ARCHIVE".

On the archive a C-MOVE destination must be defined: AET = "SERVER", "localhost", port 5104.

This sample program implements the server in method postInitComponents with AET = "SERVER", "localhost", port 5104. When using the build-in configuration file the received DICOM objects are stored in the directory "./tmp".

exitMenuItemActionPerformed
